title: 820-2936 no touchpad/keyboard/usb on battery
message:
hi, 
         kindly advise as this board 820-2936 had little liquid damage . it works completely fine when charger plugged in with the battery . as soon as we remove the charger the  touchpad , usbs and the keyboard all stop working and if we plug in the charger back  it starts working again . 
thanks.

title: 820-2936 no touchpad/keyboard/usb on battery
message:
Run EFI ASD.
Let see if any error appears...

title: 820-2936 no touchpad/keyboard/usb on battery
message: Where was the liquid damage? Possible 5V issue so was there crap around TPS51125?

title: 820-2936 no touchpad/keyboard/usb on battery
message:
hi , 
  Efi asd passed and no error to report , i will look at the tps51125 area again .
thanks
